attributes.action: Scrap hotel quarantine rates for NHS staff coming form red list countries.
attributes.additional_details: Kindly reduce/scrap hotel quarantine rates for NHS staff who had to travel abroad for various emergencies and their home country has been added to red list recently
attributes.background: NHS staff on temporary travel to India have now to pay almost their one month salary for hotel quarantine as unexpectedly India has been added to red list countries.
